rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems can gyis bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni

'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i ye
shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes

kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la

ni mi skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dbyer med pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa ye
shes kyis rnam par sbyong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas gang nas kyang mi g.yo'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtha'
yas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re la ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
rgya mtsho brgya stong grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ni ches mang ngo / /'jig

rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho bsod nams

kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul

rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob

pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho pha rol du phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs

rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/

byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten

gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho

grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul

rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag

ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i

byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med

pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu

nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /

'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho

bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong

ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re

re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs

pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor

gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho pha rol du phyin pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /

'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub

sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag sa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin kyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /
'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang

chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag

ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re

re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang

gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ni rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems

dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin

gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni

rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob

pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi

rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob

pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du sbyar te/ rten pa rnams dang / ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes rnams dang /
spyod pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams dang / dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rnams dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnams dang / tshul
khrims rnams dang / lung bstan pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag la 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la
'jug pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rnams dang / bskal pa la 'jug pa rnams dang / dus gsum bstan pa rnams dang / dus gsum la 'jug pa rnams dang / mi skyo ba'i sems
bskyed pa rnams dang / ye shes dbyer med pa rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / sangs rgyas ston pa rnams dang / kun du bzang po'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i
chos rnams dang / snying rje chen po thob pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / yongs su dag pa rnams dang /
pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / ye shes rjes su rtogs pa rnams dang / so sor rtogs pa rnams dang / stobs bskyed pa rnams dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul gyi lam rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
'chad pa rnams dang / kun du bzung ba rnams dang / spobs pa rnams dang / ye shes kyi dbang rnams dang / gnas med pa rnams dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang / ye shes mngon par sgrub pa
rnams dang / sprul pa rnams dang / byin gyis brlabs pa rnams dang / dbugs 'byin pa chen po rnyed pa rnams dang / zab mo la 'jug pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la rten pa rnams dang /
sems bskyed pa brtan pa rnams dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rnams dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / ldem po ngag la mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes

rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / rnam par
grol ba rnams dang / skyed mos tshal rnams dang / rin po che bkod pa rnams dang / mi bskyod pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa mi gtong ba la gnas pa rnams dang / rgya mtsho lta
bu'i ye shes la 'jug pa rnams dang / rin po che lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa rnams dang / rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po'i go cha rnams dang / rtsom pa chen po
rnams dang / rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa rnams dang / mi phyed pa'i dad pa rnams dang / lung bstan pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams dang / ye shes khong du chud pa
rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rgya che ba mtha' dang dbung med pa rnams dang / gter rnams dang / sdom pa rnams dang / dbang rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / chos rnam
par sprul pa rnams dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / rdzu
'phrul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / stobs rnam par sprul pa rnams dang / rnam par rol pa rnams dang / yul rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems
dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / lus rnams dang / lus kyi las rnams dang / gzugs rnams dang / ngag gi las rnams dang / sems rnams dang / sems bskyed pa rnams dang / sems rgyas par byed
pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / bsam pa rnams dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams dang / sbyor ba rnams dang / mos pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa
rnams dang / bag chags rnams dang / len pa rnams dang / nan tan rnams dang / 'grub pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges pa rnams dang / theg pa rnams dang / mi 'gyur ba
rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i chos rnams dang / nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa'i ming thob pa rnams dang / lam rnams dang / lam gyi tshad rnams
dang / lam gyi tshogs rnams dang / lam gyi sgom pa rnams dang / lam bkod pa thams cad la 'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi snod chus gang zhing sgrib pa med pa rnam par
dag pa thams cad du snang ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di
lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling re rer sems can bsam
pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de dag gis cig car mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i sku thogs pa

med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par
byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ / bam po lnga pa ste tha ma/ 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni dpes bstan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes

bu mkhas pa gang dag dpe bshad pas don shes par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na mtsho dpag tshad 'bum phrag lnga pa bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du gyur pa/ pad
ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs pa zhig yod la/ de la skyes bu la la zhig gis lcags kyi shing rta phang lo rtsib ma stong yod pa/ nam mkha' lding gi mgyogs pa bas kyang lhag pa'i rta de lta bur mgyogs pas

shing rta drangs te/ de ltar mgyogs pa'i shing rta drangs nas phang lo la'ang chus mi reg /rta'i dmigs pas kyang pad ma'i 'dab ma mi rdol ba de lta bu'i shing rta des drangs pa las mtsho chen po de nas sbrul gdug pa

steng du byung ste/ skad cig gang la shing rta bsgyur ba'i skad cig de la sbrul gdug pa des shing rta de lan bcur bskor te/ 'jam dpal skad cig gang gas sbrul gdug pas shing rta de lan cig bskor ba'i skad cig
de la dge slong kun dga' bos chos rnam pa bcu bstan pa bshad de don kyang rig par byed do/ /dge slong kun dga' bos skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la dge slong shA ri'i
bus chos rnam pa stong bstan pa bshad nas don kyang rig par byed do/ /dge slong shA ri'i bus skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus 'jig
'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri 'da'o/ /gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus skad cig gang la 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'das pa'i skad cig de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi gling re rer dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa las 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang / sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por bzhud
pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po dang / chos gnas pa dang / chos nub pa dus gcig tu ston to/ /mu
stegs can gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs thams cad du yang dus gcig tu snang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa dang / gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dbyer med pa dang mi

rten cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ /dper na rin po che bai dUr+ya las dngos po'i dbang gis gzhal du med pa'i bya ba dag 'byung ste/ bai dUr+ya ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang

ma 'dres pa'i chos dang 'thun pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba gzhal du med pa dag 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las
kyang sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dbang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du dus gcig tu skad cig skad cig la mdzad pa gzhal du med pa dag 'byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang
de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog ste/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/ /ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di

lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling du snod chus bkang ba sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams cad du cig char du snang yang gnas nas mi g.yo'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du sems can sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa de dag bsam pa ji lta ba dang / ji ltar
'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dga' ldan gnas nas g.yos pa yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du

mdzad pa rtsom pa thams cad kyang snang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rab dang / 'bring dang /
tha ma'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi 'du byed rab 'bring tha ma dag 'byung ste/ 'du byed ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'du byed de dag ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi
rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo / /de bzhin du rnam par smin pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyis dbang gis sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang /

'bring dang / rab tu mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /
'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na sprin las ro gcig pa'i char 'bab ste/ bab nas snod kyi bye brag gis kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs su gyur te/ sprin ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/
'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings

kyi ro gcig ste/ de sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i dbang gis chos kyi dbyings tha dad par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan

pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang lcags kyi yo byad rnams mi

'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang du byung ba der me'i 'od rnams dang / glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /

der nyi ma'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der nor bu'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye

chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der rgyal po rnams kyi bka' mi 'byung ngo / /der rigs bzhi rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der mi khom par skye ba
rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnams mi 'byung ngo / /der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung ngo / /
der nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu dang / 'tsho ba pa rnams mi 'byung ste/

de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyis/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan zhing yul chags pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs

pa'i yul mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes ni 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i

rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang / rnam par gnas pa dang

'jug pa dus gcig tu 'byung ba dag ni ches mang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni

rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rtsom par sbyor ba dang / las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad pa sbyor ba dag

'byung ba ni ches mang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi

khams rab 'byam thams cad ni mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bya ba thams cad gang ci 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na sa la rten/ sa la gnas nas sa bon thams cad dang / rtswa dang shing gel pa dang / rtsi dang nags tshal thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur te sa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog

mod kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i

rtsa ba thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas pa yangs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing / lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam

dpal 'di lta ste dper na gang dag zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman la reg pa de dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byin te/ zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis

grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag tha na de bzhin gshegs pa ri mor bris pa 'am/ glegs bam la bris pa la reg kyang rung ste/ rgyu des de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa

thams cad kyi zug rngu 'byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na

rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i

phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal de bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa gang 'dod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro zhing chos

bstan pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa las nyan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo / /

'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyi brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam

gyis mi khyab pa ni 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / rdul phra rab re re dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag la 'jug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re'i yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i

khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag ni ches mang ngo / /de bzhin du ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig

skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du pha rol du phyin pa tha dad
pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam
mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa
skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du
gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par

'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la
'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du rnam par thar pa

tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/

phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa mtha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la
'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rgya
mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i
mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib
pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i

bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib
pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs
med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i
mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung
ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du sems can gyi

bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams
rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das
pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /de
bzhin du bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i
khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/ /'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs

pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re rer 'jig rten gyi khams 'tshogs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' dang dbung med pa'i chos brnyes
pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyi mi khyab pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /
'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun du gzigs pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror
'gro ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ de bzhin du gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du mdzod spus kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du mtshan re res kyang gzigs
so/ /de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re res kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re res kyang gzigs so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na
sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba dag dus gcig tu gzigs so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun du gzigs pa mdor
bshad pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyis bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa ni 'jam dpal de bzhin

gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig rten khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re res 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams rgya mtsho dag 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re rer 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa
thams cad 'byung ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du zhing rnam par

'phrul pa dang / chos rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku rnam par 'phrul pa dang / smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa

rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / stobs rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer
med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa dag skad cig skad cig la 'byung ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /
'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyer med cing mi gnas pa ni 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tha dad la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa gling 'di na tha dad la gling gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyim 'di na tha dad la khyim gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i ris 'di na tha dad la lha'i ris gzhan
du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba 'di na tha dad la dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa yi dags kyi 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la yi dags kyi 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba de
gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i khams na tha dad la gzugs kyi khams su gnas pa ma yin no/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyer med cing mi gnas pa
mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa ni phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag yod pa de dag gi nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/ dus gsum gyi phyogs mtha' yas pa dag na rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'byung ba dang /

'jig par snang ba rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi mtha' ni phyogs rnams ni mi rnyed do/ /de dag gi nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/ de bzhin du rgyal ba'i mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang /

de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re'i mtha' ni phyogs rnams na mi rnyed do/ /lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi tshul bstan pa ji lta bus 'dul

ba de dag gis chos kyi tshul bstan pa de 'dra ba dag 'byung bar shes te/ de la lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor las bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med
pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan
pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs

med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs
med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni dbugs 'byin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig
gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa
dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams la
'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis
ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /kha cig gis ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /

kha cig gis ni mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor nas dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho

grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/ /de bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag gis sems kyi

skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de bzhin du mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas chos tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes
so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de

la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ni 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na rdul phra rab kyi rdul yod pa dag ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag ni ches mang ngo / /de la byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bcu

dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu

dang / bzhi bcu'o/ /'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong ngo / /'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum

bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu
dang / lnga bcu'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag stong ngo / /byang chub
sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu yod de/ de dag thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
thams cad dang / gling thams cad na dus gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyis 'gyur du mthong ngo / /'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa gang la
la zhig sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi gom pa 'dor bas steng gi phyogs logs su song ste/ gom pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams lnga

bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug tshol zhing / de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor song yang der yang de bzhin
gshegs pa nyis 'gyur du mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas
par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni 'jam

dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems

can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni ches mang ngo / /'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongs su

smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas ji snyed pa de bas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrogs pa dag ches mang ngo / /sems kyi skad

sems kyi skad cig la de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan re re dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re nas zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho dag 'byung ste/ de la

'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho

kha cig ni pha rol du phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes

su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer

rgya mtsho kha cig ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya
mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug

pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang /

spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa la 'jug

pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa

rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ /
thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob po/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs
su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jigs pa ni/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa skad cig skad cig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na zhing thams

cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rgya mtsho dag dus gcig tu rdul gcig la yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /de la sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye
shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyis tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can

rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i

ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyi yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig

ni ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i

ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems

can rgya mtsho kha cig ni mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i

bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /
sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang chub

sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med

pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye

shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /
sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du dus gsum la 'jug pa dang / dus gsum bstan pa
dang / mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du sems can rnam par sprul pa dang / zhing rnam par sprul pa dang / chos rnam par sprul pa dang /

lus rnam par sprul pa dang / smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang / spyod yul rnam par sprul pa dang / ye shes rnam par sprul pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dang /

stobs rnam par sprul pas rnam par rol pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la/ sems can rgya mtsho zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag rdul
gcig la yongs su smin par mdzad do/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par

byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal par rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul

snyed kyi sems can dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rig kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi

rten pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa gcig la 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa la bslabs pa'o snyam du bsams nas nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med

par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa 'jig rten

gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge

slong gcig la nyin gcig zan byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge slong dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gzhan gang zhig gis dad pas rjes su 'brang ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /
'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed du/
'jig rten gyi khams rdul snyed kyi dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin
pa byin pas bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba gcig la/ nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas
ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye
ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /
de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis brgyad pa
gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo

mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi brgyad pa dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams
sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig /rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /

'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhugs pa dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas
ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig
byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo gang zhig gis phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig

gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa
byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /

'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa dag la nyin bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa
byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches

bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag

la cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa 'am/ gzugs
su byas pa mthong na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed na/ thal mo sbyor ba'am/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas

ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang

bcas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul ba dang / de bzhin du lha'i na bza' rnams phul pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis tha na
phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan cig
byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rta'i shing rta

lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs

kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig

zan cig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du glang po che'i shing

rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/

'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas
yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan cig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du zla ba dang / nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro
brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub
sems dpa' cig la nyin gcig zan byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung

gi bye ma snyed du nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa sbyin pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du
lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan
cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa
bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed

do/ /bzlog ste bsti stang ma byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/ /phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / zla ba dang nyi ma'i

shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul kyis 'gro ba'ang de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu

'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bar chad byas pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems

dpa' gcig la tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang / brnyas pa'i sems skyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam
dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi mig phyung nas bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu

'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa gshe ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba dang / snyogs par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang du skyed do/ /

'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci yang rung bas brnyas pa skyed de spyos na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus

dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur te/ de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mgo re re la yang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ de'i kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lce re re
la yang gshol lnga brgya lnga brgya rmo bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su skyes
pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyug pa dang mtshon gyis bsnun te bdeg pa thams cad phrogs pa pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems
bskyed nas khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khros pa'i sems skyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang / gling re re na dgra bcom pa
gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog gcad pa dang / rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i stegs bus yongs su bskor cing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan btsugs
pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bshig pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid
la sgro btags te brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas/ rkyen ci yang rung / khro ba dang / gshe ba dang / mi snyan par zer ba dang / khyad du gsod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs
med par skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /gang byang chub
sems dpa' la skur pa des chos spangs pa yin no/ /chos kyang gzhan la chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ byang
chub sems dpa' nyid chos so/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson ra mun gnag
dag tu bcug pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis phyogs shing 'dug nas ma rungs pa 'di mi blta'o zhes zer na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa
grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis

byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu yang rung ba la smad na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab kyis 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang

che bas ri thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pas kyang / 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas

phyogs bcu dag na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol du phyin pa lnga las byung ba/ bskal pa grangs med par
bsags pa zil gyis mnan nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams
cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par

skyed do/ /'jam dpal gal te sems can thams cad phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos par gyur pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa/ mos nas kyang yi

ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / klog du 'jug pa dang / tha na glegs bam du bris pa la mos nas 'dzin par byed cing mar me dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams
kyis mchod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i

sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag /nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du med pa grangs med pa rnams dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por

'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud gsan pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig chud zos par byas na/ 'di ni de bas

ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed na/ gshe ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mchod rten gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bshig pa dang /

bsregs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ gshe ba dang mi snyan par

smras na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges par byung la/ sangs rgyas las mchod rten rnams byung zhing /

sangs rgyas las 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha'i ris thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byung la/ sangs rgyas kyang byang chub sems dpa' las byung bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' la sti stang ma byas pa ni sangs

rgyas thams cad la sti stang ma byas pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la sti stang byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas

byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod par bya'o/ /'jam dpal gal te grong khyer la la zhig na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya 'am/ bye ba stong ngam/ bye ba brgya stong ngam/ gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag yod la/
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos na de dag gi las ni rgyal pos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'am/ chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mu ges 'khrug
par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer chen po de na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' yod na de'i las ni bskal pa grangs med par mtshams med pa'i gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur/ grong khyer der 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag las rgyal pos 'khrug
par 'gyur ba mi 'byung / chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / chom rkun gyi 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / mes
'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las bskal pa rgya mtsho grangs med par
sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags su skye bar 'gyur ba yod na der 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i las bskal pa grangs med/ brjod du med par mtshams med par skye bar

'gyur ba dang / de'i las bskal pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcur ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba yang tshe 'di la myong ste/ 'khrug pas byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams chen po'i tshogs

bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na rgyar dpag tshad brgya pa'i rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang la dug srang stong yang mi 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i phung po chen pos

rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dags kyi nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang ba yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu med grangs med
pa rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug

pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ni ya ta a ni ya ta ga ti mu drA a ba ta ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge

'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcu la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman gyi

yang dag 'phags dang / mchod rten mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra skad rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcu thams cad kyang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i chu 'phrul

gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ zab cing brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa'i gzungs thob pa
sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya gang gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med

pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar bdag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol/
de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/

lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul

gyis 'gro ba lta bu ste/ 'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba yin no/ /'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i
'gro ba pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bla

na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' phyugs

kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes

kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin no/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de

bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa 'di gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/ /'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub

sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'da' bar

'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab gcig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag

'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chags snyam ste/ 'jam dpal mi de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te/

lam der zhugs nas/ de yun ring zhing dus ring mo zhig na dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa las/ de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlog nas dpag tshad brgyad bcur phyir ded de phul na 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems
mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba'am/
'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ phyugs kyi shing rta
la 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la theg pa chen po mi 'dzin mi klog par nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed

cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog

cing kha ton byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/ de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab rtul por

'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de

yang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do/ /'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig mig nad kyis mig zums par gyur

nas/ de mig dbye ba dang mthong du rung bar bya ba'i phyir zla ba gcig gis bar du dpyad byas te/ zla ba gcig lon nas mig 'byed cing 'dzums par byed pa las/ de'i dgra'am/ mi mdza' ba gzhan zhig gis pi pi ling

gi phye ma spar gang gis mig bkang nas de yang long bar byas pa de bzhin du/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de

yang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed de/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par

rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang

de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /

de yang 'di snyam du spyod de/ ma la bdag glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad

dang ldan pa la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/ de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyis stong du son pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas phyir phul te bzlog na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ glang po che'i shing rta
la zhon pa'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig
kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ glang po che'i shing rta 'tshal ba'i mi des
bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus
pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la kun
spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par

byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug par byed cing kha ton byed du 'jug la yongs su sbyong bar byed du 'jug na de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/

bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go/ /byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes

rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do/ /'jam dpal dper na shing gi sdong po chen po srid du

dpag tshad stong pa zhig yod la/ de yang rgya mtsho chen pos khyer ba las bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis de rgya mtsho chen po'i lam las phyir phul te bzlog nas/ de la lcags kyi gar bu dpag

tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig btags na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ shing gi sdong po chen po de rgya mtsho chen po la 'gro ba 'am/ sems can bsgral ba'i phyir spyad par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi shing

chen po yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho las phyir phul zhing bzlog ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshor
'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las kyang sems can rnams sgrol mi nus te/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam

dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang /

don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/

ma la bdag gis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chags snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas lam der zhugs na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/
mi des nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rngo thog lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa rgyud de'i lo dus ring mo
zhig gis rngo thog lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems

bskyed la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi snyen cing mi sten la/ bsnyen bkur mi byed nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu
spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha don mi

byed/ sems par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang ston

pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston na/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal dper na nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rgyal po chen po lang tsho dang /

stobs dang / mthu chen po thob pa ni 'dod na ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bsam

pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / lang tsho dang / mthu chen po thob pa yang 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnams
su ston par byed do/ /'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag

nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis
'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o snyam na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam
